sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PlatformEncryptionModules</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>All encryption modules</description>
        <name>PlatformEncryptionModules</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PlatformEncryptionModules = Class.create();
PlatformEncryptionModules.prototype = {
    process: function(dependent_value) {
		var moduleData = new SNC.MassEncryptionJob().getSupportedModuleChoicesForJobType(dependent_value);
		var moduleJson = JSON.parse(moduleData);
		var choiceList = new GlideChoiceList();
		for (var moduleValue in moduleJson)
			choiceList.add(moduleValue, moduleJson[moduleValue]);

		return choiceList;
	},

    type: 'PlatformEncryptionModules'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-01-20 23:25:09</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>75bb726353c1011046edddeeff7b124e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PlatformEncryptionModules</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Column Level Encryption" source="com.glide.encryption">b55dcb082f745110d8a4d5f62799b699</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_75bb726353c1011046edddeeff7b124e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-20 23:29:10</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>477</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
